title: RE: PASSWORD
body:
Hi, 

I attempted to recover my password for an account of mine but to no avail. I am yet to receive any email. I have also tried multiple times.

Thanks

replies.body: Are you doing password recovery through the client using [these](https://i.gyazo.com/49003e7c0916b06580ff910590820572.png) links? If you just google password recovery you'll get linked to the EUNE password recovery by Google, which won't work on OCE.
